chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
llli: logs_leaderLogs_interface
rlmli: refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
ollpti: one_leaderLog_per_term_interface
llsi: leaderLogs_sorted_interface
llsli: leaderLogs_sublog_interface
lsli: leader_sublog_interface
nisi: nextIndex_safety_interface
llci: leaderLogs_contiguous_interface
aelmi: allEntries_log_matching_interface
aertsi: append_entries_request_term_sanity_interface
aelsi: allEntries_leader_sublog_interface

Goal:
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries prefix_within_term_inductive

Premises:

entries_contiguous_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> contiguous_range_exact_lo es pli : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments entries_contiguous_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
allEntries_leader_sublog = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), type (snd (nwState net leader)) = Leader -> In e (map snd (allEntries (fst (nwState net h)))) -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net leader)) -> In e (log (snd (nwState net leader))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments allEntries_leader_sublog {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall net net' : network, (forall h : Net.name, nwState net h = nwState net' h) -> (forall p : packet, In p (nwPackets net') -> In p (nwPackets net)) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), (network -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
entries_gt_0_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In e es -> eIndex e > 0 : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments entries_gt_0_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
append_entries_request_term_sanity = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In e es -> eTerm e >= plt : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments append_entries_request_term_sanity {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
leaderLogs_sublog = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (t : term) (ll : list entry) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), type (snd (nwState net leader)) = Leader -> In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In e ll -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net leader)) -> In e (log (snd (nwState net leader))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_sublog {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
RaftInputHandler = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me : name) (inp : raft_input) (state : raft_data) => let '(handlerOut, state0, pkts) := handleInput me inp state in let '(leaderOut, state1, leaderPkts) := doLeader state0 me in let '(genericOut, state2, genericPkts) := doGenericServer me state1 in (handlerOut ++ leaderOut ++ genericOut, state2, pkts ++ leaderPkts ++ genericPkts) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> raft_input ->...-> list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg) Arguments RaftInputHandler {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
RaftNetHandler = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me src : name) (m : msg) (state : raft_data) => let (state0, pkts) := handleMessage src me m state in let '(leaderOut, state1, leaderPkts) := doLeader state0 me in let '(genericOut, state2, genericPkts) := doGenericServer me state1 in (leaderOut ++ genericOut, state2, pkts ++ leaderPkts ++ genericPkts) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> name -> msg -> raft_data -> list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg) Arguments RaftNetHandler {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
logs_leaderLogs = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> exists (leader : Net.name) (ll es : list entry), In (eTerm e, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net leader))) /\ removeAfterIndex (log (snd (nwState net h))) (eIndex e) = es ++ ll /\ (forall e' : entry, In e' es -> eTerm e' = eTerm e) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments logs_leaderLogs {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
doGenericServer = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (h : name) (state : raft_data) => let (out, state0) := applyEntries h state (rev (filter (fun x : entry => (lastApplied state <? eIndex x) && (eIndex x <=? commitIndex state)) (findGtIndex (log state) (lastApplied state)))) in (out, RaftState.set_raft_data_lastApplied term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output state0 (if lastApplied state0 <? commitIndex state0 then commitIndex state0 else lastApplied state0), []) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params ->...-> list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg) Arguments doGenericServer {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
